heading: HB00980
0: AN ACT REQUIRING ALL LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS TO PROVIDE CLEAR PATHWAYS OR OPEN SPACES WITHIN THEIR JURISDICTION THAT WILL SERVE AS SPRINTING, JOGGING AND RUNNING PATHS TO THE CITIZENS EVERY WEEKENDS IN ORDER TO PROMOTE THE HEALTH AND FITNESS CONSCIOUSNESS OF THE WHOLE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2019-07-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00980
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING ALL LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS TO PROVIDE CLEAR PATHWAYS OR OPEN SPACES WITHIN THEIR JURISDICTION THAT WILL SERVE AS SPRINTING, JOGGING AND RUNNING PATHS TO THE CITIZENS EVERY WEEKENDS IN ORDER TO PROMOTE THE HEALTH AND FITNESS CONSCIOUSNESS OF THE WHOLE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-02
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL GOVERNMENT ON 2019-07-24
